page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN HARLOW
page.content: At the back of each shopping precinct there are small businesses.These are not scattered about but are in small groups,with all the same types of firms put together.Staple Tye has a printers,a clothing manufacturer,car work shops,a double glazing company and a gift wrapping paper company. There is a dairy at Bush Fair,another shopping area.They employ 30 people who work on the milk floats and in the offices.They distribute 10 000 bottles of milk a day and they also supply the villages surrounding Harlow.The milkmen who deliver to the villages,drive special large floats that sometimes cover 50 miles a day. Also at Bush Fair there are some small factories,mostly engineering businesses but also a printers,a plant hire firm and a building firm.
